Description: id for the entry in the dataset ranging from 0 - 458,212
Unique Craigslist identifier for the listing
URL for the listing
Craig's list region, usually a city like las vegas.  In some cases it willl be the whole state, e.g., wyoming.  There are 405 unique regions.
The URL for the regional site, e.g., https://newyork.craigslist.org/.  There are  413 unique region_urls.
The price of the used car in USD from 0 - 3.5 billion
The year the car was made from 1900 - 2021
The manufacturer of the car, e.g., honda or jeep.  There are 44 unique manufacturers.
The model of the car, e.g. f150, malibu, or focus.  There are 31,521 unique models.
The condition of the car with these values: 'salvage',   'fair',  'good', 'excellent', 'like new',' new'
Number of cylinders ranging from 3 - 12 as well as an 'other' category.
Type of fuel with these values:  'gas', 'diesel', 'other', 'hybrid', 'electric'
Mileage recorded
Indicates what the title_status of the car is:  'clean', 'lien', 'missing', 'salvage', 'rebuilt', 'parts only'
Type of transmission:  'other', 'automatic', 'manual'
Vehicle Identification Number
Type of drive: ' rwd', 'fwd',  '4wd'
Size of the car:  full-size', 'mid-size', 'compact', 'sub-compact'
Type of vehicle with 14 values:  'other', 'sedan', 'SUV', 'pickup', 'coupe', 'van', 'truck', 'mini-van', 'wagon', 'convertible', 'hatchback', 'bus', 'offroad'
Color of the car with 13 values:  'blue', 'red', 'silver', 'black', 'white', 'grey', 'orange', 'green', 'yellow', 'custom', 'brown', 'purple'
The URL for the car image.
Free form text field describing the car.
State of listing including all 50 states and DC
Geolocation of the listing
Geocloacation of the listing
